title: Championship Riven 2016 Release

embed.description: Welcome to Ask Riot. This is a space where we focus on your questions and give you answers. Dealing with reformed players, club sizes, and Championship Riven are on the menu this week. Have a question (or two...hundred) yourself? Head over Ask Riot and sign into your League account.

body:
Hey everyone. I wanna use this discussion as a suggestion box as to how Championship Riven should be released in 2016. 
If you don't know about the release check out the link.

Comment in this discussion what your suggestions are.

My suggestion is releasing her as part of a championship bundle. you could have championship thresh, championship shyvana, championship kalista and championship riven all in the one bundle (with of course the champion). I reckon this will make previous owners to acknowledge the fact that the skin is still hard to acquire as it would cost a lot of money and it would allow new owners to have a way to purchase the skin. Cheers.

replies.body: No, because people who have it like it been rare. This isn't rare, this just costs 3 times the money.

Haunting Nocturne, Zombie Brand and a few others, were once limited like Riven, then riot was like "they're back, heres loading screen shit and an icon. Deal with it."

i don't get why they cant do the same to Riven, why is she so special?

You also have folk like myself who have all the other Championship skins and will end up paying 975 RP for it.

I think either the loading screen boarder would be nice but tbh it's just a special snowflake thing and has no real value... Gg Bruh you paid $400 for a fancy banner. 

What I think would be a good idea is give Championship Riven owners a unique in game emote for it maybe? Not sure of the logistics but if you use the mastery emote when using Championship Riven (purchased in s2) you get a banner similar in design to the Valour particle? 

Gives them something to show with it? No champion mastery needed but still a nice touch to those who want to say I got this skin as a limited edition?
Give everyone who owned it b4 a thing on their loading slice like the other skins that re released, also give them there RP back and an icon of a snowflake
